blank1_info = 0204664 | blank2_name = FIPS code | blank2_info = 08-22200 | website = }} Eagle is a statutory town that is the county seat of Eagle County, Colorado, United States. The population was 7,511 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Towns in Colorado Category:County seats in Colorado
